page.title: 13LEISURE IN CLAWTON
page.content: {Clawton}is a rural area so it has its advantages and disadvantages as far as leisure is concerned. Its advantages are that we can go{fishing in the{River Claw},hunting in the woods and there are several walks around{Clawton}as well.If you want entertainment there is a{Parish Hall and there are Church services on Sundays.There is always the{television to watch.We also have{beaches}near us. Its disadvantages are that it has no pub,no Sports Centre, (unless you go to{Holsworthy})and no swimming pool.There are no theatres,no discos or night clubs, only a small library in the nearby town of Holsworthy.
